verses.verse: Behold, <WH3117> a day of Yahweh <WH3068> comes, <WH935> when your spoil <WH7998> will be divided <WH2505> in your midst. <WH7130>

For I will gather <WH622> all nations <WH1471> against Jerusalem <WH3389> to battle; <WH4421> and the city <WH5892> will be taken, <WH3920> the houses <WH1004> rifled, <WH8155> and the women <WH802> ravished. <WH7901> Half <WH2677> of the city <WH5892> will go out <WH3318> into captivity, <WH1473> and the rest <WH3499> of the people <WH5971> will not be cut off <WH3772> from the city. <WH5892>
Then Yahweh <WH3068> will go out <WH3318> and fight <WH3898> against those nations, <WH1471> as when <WH3117> he fought <WH3898> in the day <WH3117> of battle. <WH7128>

His feet <WH7272> will stand <WH5975> in that day <WH3117> on the Mount <WH2022> of Olives, <WH2132> which is before <WH6440> Jerusalem <WH3389> on the east; <WH6924> and the Mount <WH2022> of Olives <WH2132> will be split <WH1234> in two, <WH2677> from east <WH4217> to west, <WH3220> making a very <WH3966> great <WH1419> valley. <WH1516> Half <WH2677> of the mountain <WH2022> will move <WH4185> toward the north, <WH6828> and half <WH2677> of it toward the south. <WH5045>

You shall flee <WH5127> by the valley <WH1516> of my mountains; <WH2022> for the valley <WH1516> of the mountains <WH2022> shall reach <WH5060> to Azel; <WH682> yes, <WH5127> you shall flee, just like you fled <WH5127> from before <WH6440> the earthquake <WH7494> in the days <WH3117> of Uzziah <WH5818> king <WH4428> of Judah. <WH3063> Yahweh <WH3068> my God <WH430> will come, <WH935> and all the holy ones with you. <WH6918>
It will happen in that day, <WH3117> that there will not be light, <WH216> cold, <WH3368> or frost. <WH7087>

It will be a unique <WH259> day <WH3117> which is known <WH3045> to Yahweh; <WH3068> not day, <WH3117> and not night; <WH3915> but it will come to pass, <WH6153> that at evening time <WH6256> there will be light. <WH216>

It will happen in that day, <WH3117> that living <WH2416> waters <WH4325> will go out <WH3318> from Jerusalem; <WH3389> half <WH2677> of them toward the eastern <WH6931> sea, <WH3220> and half <WH2677> of them toward the western <WH314> sea; <WH3220> in summer <WH7019> and in winter will it be. <WH2779>
Yahweh <WH3068> will be King <WH4428> over all the earth. <WH776> In that day <WH3117> Yahweh <WH3068> will be one, <WH259> and his name <WH8034> one. <WH259>

All the land <WH776> will be made like the Arabah, <WH6160> from Geba <WH1387> to Rimmon <WH7417> south <WH5045> of Jerusalem; <WH3389> and she will be lifted up, <WH7213> and will dwell <WH3427> in her place, <WH4725> from Benjamin <WH1144>'s gate <WH8179> to the place <WH4725> of the first <WH7223> gate, <WH8179> to the corner <WH6434> gate, <WH8179> and from the tower <WH4026> of Hananel <WH2606> to the king <WH4428>'s winepresses. <WH3342>
Men will dwell <WH3427> therein, <WH2764> and there will be no more curse; but Jerusalem <WH3389> will dwell <WH3427> safely. <WH983>

This will be the plague <WH4046> with which Yahweh <WH3068> will strike <WH5062> all the peoples <WH5971> who have warred <WH6633> against Jerusalem: <WH3389> their flesh <WH1320> will consume away <WH4743> while they stand <WH5975> on their feet, <WH7272> and their eyes <WH5869> will consume away <WH4743> in their sockets, <WH2356> and their tongue <WH3956> will consume away <WH4743> in their mouth. <WH6310>

It will happen in that day, <WH3117> that a great <WH7227> panic <WH4103> from Yahweh <WH3068> will be among them; <WH2388> and they will lay hold everyone <WH376> on the hand <WH3027> of his neighbor, <WH7453> and his hand <WH3027> will rise up <WH5927> against the hand <WH3027> of his neighbor. <WH7453>

Judah <WH3063> also will fight <WH3898> at Jerusalem; <WH3389> and the wealth <WH2428> of all the surrounding <WH5439> nations <WH1471> will be gathered together: <WH622> gold, <WH2091> and silver, <WH3701> and clothing, <WH899> in great <WH3966> abundance. <WH7230>

So will be the plague <WH4046> of the horse, <WH5483> of the mule, <WH6505> of the camel, <WH1581> and of the donkey, <WH2543> and of all the animals <WH929> that will be in those <WH1992> camps, <WH4264> as that plague. <WH4046>

It will happen that everyone who is left <WH3498> of all the nations <WH1471> that came <WH935> against Jerusalem <WH3389> will go up <WH5927> from <WH1767> year <WH8141> to year <WH8141> to worship <WH7812> the King, <WH4428> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> and to keep <WH2287> the feast <WH2282> of tents. <WH5521>

It will be, <WH4940> that whoever of all the families of the earth <WH776> doesn't <WH5927> go up to Jerusalem <WH3389> to worship <WH7812> the King, <WH4428> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> on them there will be no rain. <WH1653>

If the family <WH4940> of Egypt <WH4714> doesn't <WH5927> go up, and doesn't <WH935> come, neither will it rain on them. <WH4046> This will be the plague with which Yahweh <WH3068> will strike <WH5062> the nations <WH1471> that don't <WH5927> go up to keep <WH2287> the feast <WH2282> of tents. <WH5521>
This will be the punishment <WH2403> of Egypt, <WH4714> and the punishment <WH2403> of all the nations <WH1471> that don't <WH5927> go up to keep <WH2287> the feast <WH2282> of tents. <WH5521>

In that day <WH3117> there will be on the bells <WH4698> of the horses, <WH5483> "HOLY <WH6944> TO YAHWEH; <WH3068>" and the pots <WH5518> in Yahweh <WH3068>'s house <WH1004> will be like the bowls <WH4219> before <WH6440> the altar. <WH4196>

Yes, <WH5518> every pot in Jerusalem <WH3389> and in Judah <WH3063> will be holy <WH6944> to Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies; <WH6635> and all those who sacrifice <WH2076> will come <WH935> and take <WH3947> of them, <WH1310> and cook in them. <WH3117> In that day there will no longer be a Canaanite <WH3669> in the house <WH1004> of Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies. <WH6635>
